attributes.action: reduce the amount of tax charged on fuel in this 'tax till we drop' country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is now mid Nov 2007 and the price of fuel has gone up again. Average price is more than £1 per litre.
How much longer will this go on without the government listening to the people it represents.. The problem is that when we've all had enough and decide to take action, that action become illegal. Something is very wrong in this country when your government doesn't listen to it's people. Please join me in the petition by forwarding links on to everyone you know... COME ON UK STAND TOGETHER AND SAY NO MORE..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
